name: Apocalypse (itch) (krisztian2545)
description:
Play it here (the embedded version doesn't work): https://www.game.matejambor.com/

In this revolutionary game you are given a chance to save the dinosaurs from extinction. Use your portal and catch every asteroid, but beware they get bigger! The longer you are trying, the harder it gets! Make GOD angry and change the future.

Controls: 
move the portal: Q, W, E, R
pause: P
